body_html:
@briandw are your git submodules updated and init-ed? Can you run "git submodule update --init --recursive" in the pytorch directory? That error seems to be coming from the gtest repo, which we only point to.

The Anaconda error you pasted is just conda-build telling you that it detected that there was an error during building. The actual error that crashed will be further up in your output.

Do you already have pytorch installed via conda?
